mapper.select: select count(*) from post_info where pi_title like #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into post_info(pi_title, pi_sub, pi_i_seq, pi_rq_seq, pi_state) values(#{pi_title},#{pi_sub},#{pi_i_seq},#{pi_rq_seq},#{pi_state})
mapper.select: select pi_seq from post_info order by pi_seq desc limit 1
